newsitems.title: Hitman 2's new high security bank is a joy to break into
newsitems.contents: There's something special about bank levels. Whenever a stealth game or an immersive sim asks me to sneak into a bank of any description, I find it hugely exciting. Walking into the gleaming marble lobby, taking a mental note of the armed guards, security cameras, bulletproof glass, and laser g...

newsitems.title: Hitman 2 s September roadmap sends Agent 47 to The Maldives
newsitems.contents: It’s time that Agent 47 had a break from the assassin life. But unfortunately, his superiors have other arrangements.  In this month's Hitman 2 roadmap, Agent 47 is jetting off to Haven Island, a tropical sun-soaked resort in The Maldives. But there’s no time for pina coladas...

newsitems.title: HITMAN 2 – August Update 2.60.0
newsitems.author: IO_Clemens
newsitems.contents: August in HITMAN 2 brings another content drop for Expansion Pass owners, adding the Smart Casual suit and 2 new items to Agent 47’s inventory. All HITMAN 2 owners will also get a host of quality-of-life improvements for various aspects of the game and numerous fixes and tweaks in this month’s updat...

newsitems.title: All the Nvidia RTX ray tracing and DLSS games confirmed so far
newsitems.author: contact@rockpapershotgun.com (Katharine Castle)
newsitems.contents: It’s Gamescom this week, which can only mean one thing – more confirmed ray tracing games for Nvidia’s RTX and selected GTX 16-series graphics cards. Indeed, the big one that’s just been announced is Minecraft, which (like Quake II RTX) is getting full, real-time ray tracin...
